EmailTemplate.subject: What Can eCommerce Look Like for You at Brookshire Brothers?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: At Brookshire Brothers, you know your brand better than anyone. Your brand quality is what keeps your customers coming back – and turns your new customers into loyal ones. But with your current eCommerce solution, don’t you worry about overspending, only to lose your connection with your customers? In comes NCR Freshop. NCR Freshop will enable you to take your unique in-store experience and translate it online, taking the in-store experience and delivering it with consistency in a digital world. Built with retailers like you in mind, NCR Freshop: - Delivers all essential eCommerce functionality and more— at a better price point - Easily integrates into current systems, making push-to-POS simpler - Gives you full ownership of your customer experience, from control of your brand to consistency in your pricing See what NCR Freshop can do for you at Brookshire Brothers. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Got questions?
